skill.name: blocklet-updater
skill.description: Creates a new release for a blocklet project by bumping version, building, and bundling. Use when asked to "create a new release", "bump and bundle", or "update blocklet version".
skill.summary: Creates a new release for a blocklet project by bumping version, building, and bundling. Use when as...
skill.author: ArcBlock

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based skill containing only documentation files. No executable code, scripts, or network calls. The skill provides workflow guidance for the AI to execute standard blocklet CLI commands in the user's project directory.

content.user_title: Create blocklet releases with version bump and bundle
content.value_statement: Manually creating blocklet releases requires running multiple commands in sequence. This skill automates the entire release workflow including version bump, build, metadata verification, and bundle creation.
actual_capabilities: Bump blocklet version using blocklet version command
Install dependencies and run build when package.json build script exists
Locate index.html entry point in common output directories
Verify and update blocklet.yml main field alignment
Run metadata verification with blocklet meta
Create release bundle with blocklet bundle --create-release
limitations: Only works with blocklet projects that have blocklet.yml
Requires blocklet CLI (@blocklet/cli) to be installed
Does not handle custom build configurations outside standard patterns
Cannot recover from build failures - exits immediately on error

best_practices: Ensure blocklet CLI is installed globally before running release workflow
Run pnpm install manually first if network issues are suspected
Verify blocklet.yml has all required fields: did, name, version
anti_patterns: Running the skill on non-blocklet projects without blocklet.yml
Skipping build failure investigation - always fix build errors first
Modifying the main field without verifying index.html location

faq.question: What projects work with this skill?
faq.answer: Only ArcBlock blocklet projects with a valid blocklet.yml file. Other projects will exit with an error.

faq.question: What version bump types are supported?
faq.answer: The skill uses 'patch' by default. You can request 'minor' or 'major' bumps in your prompt.

faq.question: Does it work with npm instead of pnpm?
faq.answer: No, the skill specifically uses pnpm for dependency installation. Ensure pnpm is available in your environment.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill only operates on your project files locally. No data is sent to external servers.

faq.question: What causes immediate exit?
faq.answer: Missing blocklet.yml, version bump failure, build failure, missing index.html, or bundle creation failure.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual releases?
faq.answer: The skill automates the same commands you would run manually, reducing errors and ensuring consistent workflow.
